justification: Offer targets B’s surplus at WR but ignores B’s mindset in the rationale. While including an injured committee RB (buy-low) and a volatile WR loosely fits B’s preferences, the model doesn’t articulate that. Value is lopsided for a Tier 1 WR; TE add-in doesn’t help B (already has Tier 1 TE). Reasoning is brief and A-centric, with minimal evidence of modeling B’s beliefs, needs, or playoff priorities.
